verses.name: Joshua 21:12
verses.text: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, gave they to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.

verses.name: Joshua 21:13
verses.text: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:14
verses.text: And Jattir with her suburbs, and Eshtemoa with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:15
verses.text: And Holon with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:16
verses.text: And Ain with her suburbs, and Juttah with her suburbs, and Beth–shemesh with her suburbs; nine cities out of those two tribes.
